nodes.body: {📅 events} Come playtest games and give feedback at the STLGameDev [Share & Play](https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/305690663/) event on March 1st at 1pm at the UMSL eSports Arena! Bring your in-progress games for playtesting

{📅 events} STLGameDev's monthly [Gamedev Social](https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/305690599/) is on March 13th at 7pm at Dirty20 Bar. Come hang out with fellow creators and chat about making, playing, and admiring games! Talk about your game ideas and get inspired! Make friends and find collaborators.

{✨ demos} Colorgrave has a demo out on Steam for their next game, [Claire a-la Mode](https://bsky.app/profile/colorgrave.bsky.social/post/3ldgxycr5ns2y), with pixel art by [Brendan Steppig](https://bsky.app/profile/looloopaa.bsky.social)
{🎮 releases} Axol Studio made a small puzzle platformer in January [Saurcerer: The Terrible Lizard Wizard](https://axolstudio.itch.io/saurcerer)

{🕹️ updates} Butterscotch Shenanigans released their final [Crashlands 2 trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ib7fzLf59vo)! The game is releasing April 10th on Steam, Google Play, and the iOS App store

{🕹️ updates} The [Violets of Amicus kickstarter](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/creationmodestudios/the-violets-of-amicus) is currently funding with pixel art by [Tony Wojnar](https://bsky.app/profile/tonywojnar.bsky.social)
{🫙 game jams} Read about the St. Louis Global Game Jam in our [postmortem](https://stlgame.dev/blog/global-game-jam-2025-postmortem/)

{🏗 WIPs} Tony Wojnar is working on Dribble 2! Check out this [lifeguard enemy](https://bsky.app/profile/tonywojnar.bsky.social/post/3liamvvfp722t) and [deadly ripple effect](https://bsky.app/profile/tonywojnar.bsky.social/post/3lfi6ogfgy22v) for the game
{🏗 WIPs} Kris Truitt is working on a [spooky cartoon game](https://bsky.app/profile/kristruitt.bsky.social/post/3l7vcn27j6x2w) with a great hand-drawn cartoony aesthetic

{🧪 testing} A private beta will be held in a few weeks for [In Tirol](https://bsky.app/profile/jamesckane.bsky.social/post/3lfptjtktms2p), a VR game by James Kane. [Sign up now!](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdHy4XVmnbCAiAUpbrNzGv0KXLWHqhHG2Jss4JWDUwP5jiyxw/viewform)
{🎨art} Brendan Steppig (Looloopaa) made some beautiful fan art of [Sybil from Pseudoregalia](https://bsky.app/profile/looloopaa.bsky.social/post/3lifrjtmfgk26)
{🏗 WIPs} Tashkas is working on a [voxel game](https://x.com/rbutrimavicius/status/1873841054447002058) where you build the world by playing cards
{✨ demos} The demo for [Demon Tides](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3477260/Demon_Tides_Demo/) with music by [Fat Bard](https://www.fatbard.com/) has released on Steam!

{🎮 releases} [Die in the Dungeon](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2026820/Die_in_the_Dungeon/) with music by [Fat Bard](https://fatbard.com) has just released! You can also [get the soundtrack](https://fatbard.bandcamp.com/album/die-in-the-dungeon-2)!

{🕹️ updates} Michael Hicks [wrote about Goals](https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/2138560/view/574874782030364685) in his upcoming game [Dissent on Mars](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2138560/Dissent_on_Mars/)

{!header} It has been a little while since we have had a chance to put one of these out, but we're going to do our best to have one out *every month* from now on! *Also*, RoundUps will be going out as our Monthly Newsletter from now on! You will be able to sign up on our website: [https://stlgame.dev](https://stlgame.dev) in the near future.
